The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 October is 598,142 (1,062.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 October, there were 92,422 new confirmed cases (164.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 October, there were 81,098 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 14% ( 11,324 extra cases).
